LanguageData.DHTC.Prey.Label: Children can be hunted
LanguageData.DHTC.Prey.Tooltip: Children can be hunted by any wild predator. This doesnt change manhunter
LanguageData.DHTC.CanTakeDamage.Label: Children can be hurt
LanguageData.DHTC.CanTakeDamage.Tooltip: Children won't be directly targeted, but they can still be hurt by indirect sources
LanguageData.DHTC.canBeRaidTarget.Label: Children can be targeted by raiders
LanguageData.DHTC.canBeRaidTarget.Tooltip: Children can be target by any raid or similar threat
LanguageData.DHTC.canEquipWeapons.Label: Children can equip weapons
LanguageData.DHTC.canEquipWeapons.Tooltip: When holding a weapon they will not be protected regardless. Disable this if you never want a child to hold a weapon
LanguageData.DHTC.ChildCantEquip: Children can not equip a weapon
